long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Manager is a versatile and user-friendly extension designed to help you efficiently manage your daily tasks. Whether you're juggling personal to-dos or professional responsibilities, Task Manager offers a range of features to keep you organized and on track.

- Key Features:
     + Create and Manage Tasks: Easily add tasks to your personal to-do list and organize them by 
        priority. Customize your task list to fit your needs and stay on top of what matters most.
     + Set Reminders: Receive timely notifications to remind you of upcoming deadlines and 
        scheduled tasks. Stay on top of your commitments with automated reminders that ensure 
        you never miss an important task.

- Permissions:
     + Access to All URLs: This permission allows Task Manager to offer comprehensive task 
        management across all the websites you use, providing seamless integration and 
        functionality wherever you are.

- Benefits:
     + Enhanced Productivity: Streamline your workflow and boost your productivity by having all 
        your tasks and reminders in one convenient place.
     + Avoid Missing Tasks: Stay organized and prevent important tasks from slipping through the 
        cracks with timely reminders and a well-organized task list.

Task Manager is designed to simplify task management, making it easier for you to stay focused and achieve your goals. Try it today and experience a more organized, productive workday!
